snippet.title: FRONTLINE: Panzer Blitzkrieg!
snippet.description:
Steam link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1238330/
"Frontline: Panzer Blitzkrieg" is a turn-based, Offline, operational strategy WW2 wargame that puts you in command of the German forces as they try to push their way into Russia during Operation: Barbarossa, Typhoon, Zitadelle(Kursk)
FEATURES:
✔Massive weapons arsenal: 200+ unique units
✔Non-Linear Campaign
✔Designed for Windows-PC only
✔30 Historical scenarios
✔Level up & Active abilities for every unit
✔Scripted events
✔HD graphics and Units
✔Battles objectives that can be completed when replaying missions
✔Reinforcements
✔No turn limit
✔Zoom controls
✔Intuitive interface
✔No ADS or Micro-transactions
✔Localization: En, De, Ru, It, Es, Por, Fr, Cn, Jp, Arabic.
https://www.facebook.com/88mmGames/
